article_title: Washington DC's Trash-CanGate Scandal Is An Allegory Of Government

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: In the middle of his own re-election campaign, a D.C. mayor spends $9 million dollars of the taxpayers' money to rush 200,000 shiny new garbage/recycling bins to D.C. residents.
og.title: Washington DC's Trash-CanGate Scandal Is An Allegory Of Government
